title: AI powered Collaborative Workspace(Hackathon Project)
description: Developed an AI-powered collaborative hub for BCAT company, integrating Google Workspace to streamline cross-departmental communication and resource sharing

title: BERT-LSTM-CNN based Fake News detection and classification
description: Project that focuses on detecting fake news articles using FakeNewsNet and LIAR Dataset containing 17,441 real and 11,424 fake news

title: Industrial PPE detection using Computer Vision
description: Leveraging Computer Vision to accurately predict PPE worn/not-worn by industry workers,and developed live video prediction compatible with industry CCTV systems

title: AlphaNumPredictor
description: Build and trained a optimized deep Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) using Pytorch on the EMNIST dataset, achieving an impressive 92% test accuracy across 36 classes

title: Transformers for Dense Video Captioning of Soccer Videos
description: Fine-tuned CLIP model for dense video captioning using Soccer-net dataset

title: Predictive Model for Airline Fare Forecasting Using Ensemble Technique
description: The main objective of this project is to address issue of dynamic airline pricing by developing a predictive model and accurately forecasting different airline ticket prices to equip passengers with the information they need to plan their trips more efficiently
